Articles.Content: Every time I load one of two ships, launch and revert, or use subassemblies several times, the save corrupts. I Can delete the save and put the ships back in and it not be corrupt until I use the VAB. I tested it in a fresh install and my normal modded, both corrupt. I am using windows 10, 64 bit and 1.0.5 ksp. The save corruption is I cannot exit the VAB SPH, launch anything, and cannot edit the crew, craft (second time it gets loaded in the corrupted save), or the staging.

@LABHOUZE, are you having trouble with @LABHOUSE?

If you can't log in PM me and I'll fix it, otherwise I will merge these accounts.
